alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Jim Hogg; Northern Hidalgo; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 21 at 9:54PM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Zapata, Jim Hogg, Brooks, Inland Kenedy, Inland Willacy, Coastal Kenedy and Northern Hidalgo Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional Hard Freeze Warnings are expected Friday night into Saturday morning and possibly again Saturday night into Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Jim Hogg; Northern Hidalgo; Zapata
